Posts.Content: Jan 19, 2017 07:38PM LAPM wrote: I was able to get my biopsy moved up to Monday with another breast surgeon. That makes me feel better. This waiting is the hardest. This morning I received my U/S report showing I had 2 hypoechoic masses. One is 6 x 6 x 7 mm and the other is 7 x 3 x 6 mm. They are at 2:00 and 3:00. I have a birads of 4b. I have to admit after getting the u/s results I am getting more concerned. My sister was diagnosed at 42 and I am now 42. Plus I have 2 cousins and aunt all on my moms side that has had breast cancer. Thanks for letting me share!! Grammasue or HCP have either of you received any results back yet? SpecialK - thanks for the enouragement to reach out to get my biopsy moved up
Posts.Title: Had my biopsy this afternoon. GrammaSue Adelozier

Posts.Content: Jan 18, 2017 08:39PM LAPM wrote: Hi! Can't sleep. I had my annual mammo on Friday 13th (whose plan was that...). Received a call back for U/S on Monday. I have 2 spots that they said looked solid and wanted to do a biopsy. However, they are making me wait for 2 weeks to meet with Breast surgeon for her to do the core biopsy. Shouldn't I be able to get the biopsy first and then meet with her if it comes back as cancer? Should I push to get biopsy sooner? Thanks for any advice
Posts.Title: Had my biopsy this afternoon. GrammaSue Adelozier
